text: Merry Christmas with Love is Clay Aiken's first Christmas album. It was released by RCA Records on November 16, 2004. It was certified platinum and was recognized by Billboard as the Best-selling Christmas/holiday album of 2004 and the Best-selling Christian album of 2005. The album was re-released on August 18, 2009 on the Sony label. Merry Christmas with Love debuted at number four on the U.S. Billboard 200 chart with about 270,000 copies sold.Margo Whitmire, "Eminem Thankful To Remain No. 1", Billboard.com, November 24, 2004, retrieved November 14, 2016 This was its highest position on the chart. By the end of 2004, around 1,004,000 copies of the album had been sold. The album set a new record for fastest-selling holiday album, since SoundScan began in March 1991.
